name: scrollmap-cursors
description: Show cursor positions on the scrollbar

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Hide markers if count exceeds this value. Zero means no limit.

showAll.title: Show all cursors
showAll.description: Display all cursors or only the last one.

inactiveShow.title: Show in inactive editors
inactiveShow.description: Display cursor markers in editors that are not currently focused.
